name: Jasper's Home Invasion (And Mass Stamp Heist)
name_original: Jasper's Home Invasion (And Mass Stamp Heist)
description:
Join Jasper in a breaking and entering adventure!

He wants those stamps, this spooky old house has stamps, he's gonna get those stamps!

Game is in pre-pre-pre-pre-pre alpha. Very little of it is finished, but feel free to play anyway! Feedback is groovy man.
